mapper.insert: insert into setmeal(status,category_id, name, price, description, image, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) VALUES (#{status},#{categoryId},#{name},#{price},#{description},#{image},#{createTime},#{updateTime},#{createUser},#{updateUser})
mapper.select: select setmeal.*, c.name as categoryName from setmeal left join category c on setmeal.category_id = c.id where setmeal.id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update setmeal
category_id = #{categoryId},
name = #{name},
price = #{price},
status = #{status},
description = #{description},
image = #{image}
where id = #{id}
